structur of a lisp system us two level storag inan ideal list process system there would be enough corememori to contain all the data and program describ inthi paper ar a number of techniqu that have beenus to build a lisp system util a drum forit princip storag medium with a surprisingli low time penaltifor us of thi slow storag devic the techniqu includcare segment of system program alloc of virtual memori toallow address arithmet for type determin and a special algorithmfor build reason linear list a scheme for bind variablis describ which is good in thi environ and allowfor complet
